alert.note: Alert for Upper Treasure Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 09 at 2:25PM MST until January 10 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST /10 AM PST/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. In Baker County additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches, except 4 to 7 inches over the mountains. In the Upper Treasure Valley, up to 2 inches with up to 4 inches in the foothills. Areas south and west of I-84 will see less than an inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...In Idaho, Upper Treasure Valley zone. In Oregon, Baker County zone. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST /10 AM PST/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Snow will impact the morning commute on Wednesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain and snow showers through this evening then accumulating snow develops late tonight into Wednesday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
